triples.name: Runtime verification
triples.relevance: Runtime Assurance builds on runtime verification concepts for monitoring and ensuring safety of running systems.

triples.name: Safety-critical system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the design and assurance of safety-critical systems that must meet high reliability standards.

triples.name: Control system
triples.relevance: Safety filtering approaches are specifically designed for complex control systems that require guaranteed safe operation.

triples.name: General Dynamics F-16 Fighting Falcon
triples.relevance: The F-16 aircraft is the primary case study demonstrating the application of Auto GCAS runtime assurance system.

triples.name: Automatic Ground Collision Avoidance System
triples.relevance: Auto GCAS is the main runtime assurance system presented as a novel application of safety filtering for aircraft control.

triples.name: Cyber-physical system
triples.relevance: The paper emphasizes applying runtime assurance to safety-critical cyber-physical systems with complex integrated control.
